channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE COLLECTION
item.description: The least serious defense force ever
item.content:encoded: Halt an evil invasion and save the world in EARTH DEFENSE FORCE. Our newest bundle features an amazing collection of EDF titles like EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS 2, EDF 4, and EDF 5, alongside a massive collection of bonus content like additional missions, cosmetics, and characters. These awesome arcade shooters are quick with the action and heavy on the charm—defeat the Ravagers and laugh along the way!

item.title: Humble Heroines 2025
item.content:encoded: Celebrate Women's History Month with Humble Heroines: Rebels, Curses, and Mystery. Take charge as powerful protagonists including Seelah from Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Enhanced Edition, Jesse Faden from Control: Ultimate Edition, and Fury from Darksiders 3!

item.title: HeroCraft PC Complete
item.content:encoded: Great games come in a variety of sizes and from every corner of the globe—jump into the creative and imaginative worlds of beloved international studio, HeroCraft with our latest value-packed game bundle. Get hot titles like Temptest, Gravewood High, Revival: Recolonization, and much more. Pay what you want for the ultimate HeroCraft experience, help uplift indie developers, and support Care.org with your purchase. Explore the unknown and pick up an indie game today!

item.title: Fulqrum Publishing Spring Break
item.description: Freaky fun times with Fulqrum Publishing
item.content:encoded: Explore the games of epic international devs, Fulqrum Publishing with our newest bundle of great titles. This collection brings the heat—survive a moody Lovecraftian FPS world in Forgive Me Father. Get tactical with a fantasy setting and engaging RPG mechanics in Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark. Embrace the darkness with the retro inspired RPG Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones. Play great games and help support nPower and The Global Foodbanking Network with your purchase!
